name: slime based antifungal drug
description: When you asked for an antifungal drug the queen programmer said, mycus invasion detected anti fungals required. Then is spat out the recipe for this.

name: slime produced fertilizer
description: Manure, or other plant matter turned into plant fertilizer by your puffer chemical factory.
//: This comes out as one charge in the bag, and the price is accurate-KA101.
